mapper.select: select top 8 * from KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_NEWS where part = 'news' and flag = 'N' order by num desc
select top 2 * from KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_NEWS where part = 'movie' and flag = 'N' and wtype = 'U' order by num desc
select top 2 * from KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_NEWS where part = 'movie' and flag = 'N' and wtype = 'S' order by num desc
select top 5 * from KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_NEWS where part = 'photo' and flag = 'N' order by num desc

select top 6 * from KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_NEWS where part in ('movie','photo') AND ( (part = 'movie' AND tags LIKE CONCAT('%', #{player_no}, '%')) OR (part = 'photo' AND num IN ( SELECT info_num FROM KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_NEWS_PHOTO WHERE tagcode LIKE CONCAT('%', #{player_no}, '%') )) ) and flag = 'N' order by num desc
select top 6 * from KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_NEWS where part in ('movie','news') and tags like CONCAT('%', #{pl_no}, '%') and flag = 'N' order by num desc
select top 4 * from KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_NEWS where part = 'movie' and etc1 = 'H' and flag = 'N' order by num desc

select top 4 a.*,FORMAT(a.wdate, 'yyyy.MM.dd') AS reg_date ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_NEWS_TAIL b WHERE b.info_num = a.num) AS tail_count from KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_NEWS a where a.part = 'notice' and a.flag = 'N' order by a.num desc
select * from KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_SEARCH_KEYWORD order by view_order,num desc
select * from KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_PLAYER where 1=1 and pl_show ='Y' and pl_check = 'Y' and pl_pos_code in ('a','g','c','f','s') order by pl_order,pl_pos_code
select max(game_date) last_game_date,MIN(game_date) first_game_date from KCC_EGIS.kbl_data.team_schedule WHERE season_code = '45' and (home_team ='60' or away_team ='60') and game_round = #{round}
select top 1 * from KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_NEWS where part = 'movie' and wtype = 'U' and etc1 = #{etc1} and flag = 'N' order by num desc
select *,FORMAT(wdate, 'yyyy.MM.dd') AS reg_date from KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_NEWS where num = #{num}

select * ,SUBSTRING(a.game_date, 1, 4) + '.' +SUBSTRING(a.game_date, 5, 2) + '.' + SUBSTRING(a.game_date, 7, 2) AS game_date_format ,b.stadium_name_1 ,SUBSTRING(a.game_start, 1, 2) + ':' + SUBSTRING(a.game_start, 3, 2) AS game_start_format from KCC_EGIS.kbl_data.team_schedule a, KCC_EGIS.kbl_data.code_stadium b where game_date = #{game_date} and a.stadium_code = b.stadium_code and a.season_code = b.season_code

SELECT * FROM ( select *,FORMAT(wdate , 'yyyy.MM.dd') AS formatted_date, FORMAT(wdate, 'HH:mm') AS formatted_time, KCC_EGIS.egis.FN_MASK_ID(id) as id2, KCC_EGIS.egis.FN_MASK_NAME(writer) writer2 from KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_NEWS_TAIL where info_num = #{num} ) A ORDER BY num desc OFFSET (#{currentPage}-1)*#{limit} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY

select TOP 1 a.*,FORMAT(a.wdate, 'yyyy.MM.dd') AS reg_date, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_NEWS_TAIL b WHERE b.info_num = a.num) AS tail_count from KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_NEWS a where 1=1 and a.part = #{part} and a.num > #{num} and a.flag = 'N' ORDER BY a.num

select TOP 1 a.*,FORMAT(a.wdate, 'yyyy.MM.dd') AS reg_date, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_NEWS_TAIL b WHERE b.info_num = a.num) AS tail_count from KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_NEWS a where 1=1 and a.part = #{part} and a.num < #{num} and a.flag = 'N' ORDER BY a.num DESC
select * from KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_NEWS_PHOTO where info_num = #{num}
mapper.update: update KCC_EGIS.egis.TBL_NEWS set visited = visited +1 where num = #{num}
